content: Looks like OpenNURBS just released a new 7.0.20255 version https://github.com/mcneel/opennurbs/releases

/me nods. At some point we're going to have to figure out the upgrade path for that, but it's going to be tricky - I know we've got a number of patches they never took back, and we'll have to make sure we default to writing the same version to our .g files as our current bundled version for backwards compatibility.
